title: BRIEF-Nutanix Says Entered Into Agreement To Acquire Netsil
text: 29 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Nutanix Says Entered Into Agreement To Acquire Netsil Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 12 (Reuters) - Nutanix Inc: * NUTANIX SAYS ENTERED INTO AGREEMENT AND PLAN OF MERGER AND REORGANIZATION TO ACQUIRE NETSIL INC - SEC FILING * NUTANIX - UNDER TERMS OF DEAL, BETWEEN 85% & 100% OF CONSIDERATION WILL BE PAYABLE IN SHARES OF COâ€™S CLASS A COMMON STOCK * NUTANIX - UPON DEAL CLOSE, CO EXPECTS TO ISSUE AT LEAST 1.2 MILLION & UP TO ABOUT 1.4 MILLION SHARES OF CO'S CLASS A COMMON STOCK Source text : ( bit.ly/2p3mbZr ) Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
